rows.arabic: يسٓ
rows.translation: Ya Seen.
rows.transliteration: yā sīn

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

rows.arabic: وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
rows.translation: I swear by the Quran full of wisdom
rows.transliteration: wal qur-ānil ḥakīm

rows.arabic: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
rows.translation: Most surely you are one of the apostles
rows.transliteration: innaka laminal mursalīn

rows.arabic: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
rows.translation: On a right way.
rows.transliteration: `alā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

rows.arabic: تَنزِيلَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
rows.translation: A revelation of the Mighty, the Merciful.
rows.transliteration: tanzīlal-`azīzir raḥīm

rows.arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ
rows.translation: That you may warn a people whose fathers were not warned, so they are heedless.
rows.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābā-uhum fahum ghāfilūn

rows.arabic: لَقَدْ حَقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Certainly the word has proved true of most of them, so they do not believe.
rows.transliteration: laqad ḥaqqal qawlu `alā aktharihim fahum lā yu-minūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
rows.translation: Surely We have placed chains on their necks, and these reach up to their chins, so they have their heads raised aloft.
rows.transliteration: innā ja`alnā fī a`nāqihim aghlālan fahiya ilal-adhqāni fahum muqmaḥūn

rows.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنۢ بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
rows.translation: And We have made before them a barrier and a barrier behind them, then We have covered them over so that they do not see.
rows.transliteration: waja`alnā min bayni aydīhim saddan wa min khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynāhum fahum lā yubṣirūn

rows.arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: And it is alike to them whether you warn them or warn them not: they do not believe.
rows.transliteration: wasawā-un `alayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhirhum lā yu-minūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَخَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
rows.translation: You can only warn him who follows the reminder and fears the Beneficent Allah in secret; so announce to him forgiveness and an honorable reward.
rows.transliteration: innamā tundhiru manit-taba`adh dhikra wakhashiyar raḥmāna bil ghayb ۖ fabashhirhu bimaghfiratin wa-ajrin karīm

rows.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا۟ وَءَاثَـٰرَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَـٰهُ فِىٓ إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: Surely We give life to the dead, and We write down what they have sent before and their footprints, and We have recorded everything in a clear writing.
rows.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥyil mawtā wanaktubu mā qaddamū wa-āthārahum ۚ wakulla shay-in aḥṣaynāhu fī imāmin mubīn

rows.arabic: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَآءَهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
rows.translation: And set out to them an example of the people of the town, when the apostles came to it.
rows.transliteration: waḍrib lahum mathalan aṣ-ḥābal qaryati idh jā-ahal mursalūn

rows.arabic: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمُ ٱثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
rows.translation: When We sent to them two, they rejected both of them, then We strengthened (them) with a third, so they said: Surely we are apostles to you.
rows.transliteration: idh arsalnā ilayhimuth-nayni fakadhhabūhumā fa`azzaznā bithālithin faqālū innā ilaykum mursalūn

rows.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
rows.translation: They said: You are naught but mortals like ourselves, nor has the Beneficent Allah revealed anything; you only lie.
rows.transliteration: qālū mā antum illā basharun mithlunā wa mā anzalar raḥmānu min shay-in in antum illā takdhibūn

rows.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
rows.translation: They said: Our Lord knows that we are most surely apostles to you.
rows.transliteration: qālū rabbunā ya`lamu innā ilaykum lamursalūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا عَلَيْنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
rows.translation: And nothing devolves on us but a clear deliverance (of the message).
rows.transliteration: wa mā `alaynā illal-balāghul mubīn

rows.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا۟ لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: They said: Surely we augur evil from you; if you do not desist, we will certainly stone you, and there shall certainly afflict you a painful chastisement from us.
rows.transliteration: qālū innā taṭayyarnā bikum ۖ la-in lam tantahū lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minnā `adhābun alīm

rows.arabic: قَالُوا۟ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
rows.translation: They said: Your evil fortune is with you; what! if you are reminded! Nay, you are an extravagant people.
rows.transliteration: qālū ṭā-irukum ma`akum ۚ a-in dhukkirtum ۚ bal antum qawmun musrifūn

rows.arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنْ أَقْصَا ٱلْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
rows.translation: And from the remote part of the city there came a man running, he said: O my people! follow the apostles;
rows.transliteration: wajā-a min aqṣal madīnati rajulun yas`ā qāla yāqawmit-tabi`ul mursalīn

rows.arabic: ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ مَن لَّا يَسْـَٔلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
rows.translation: Follow him who does not ask you for reward, and they are the followers of the right course;
rows.transliteration: ittabi`ū man lā yas-alukum ajran wahum muhtadūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا لِىَ لَآ أَعْبُدُ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
rows.translation: And what reason have I that I should not serve Him Who brought me into existence? And to Him you shall be brought back;
rows.transliteration: wa mā liya lā a`budul ladhī faṭaranī wa ilayhi turja`ūn

rows.arabic: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
rows.translation: What! shall I take besides Him gods whose intercession, If the Beneficent Allah should desire to afflict me with a harm, shall not avail me aught, nor shall they be able to deliver me?
rows.transliteration: a-attakhidhu min dūnihi ālihatan in yuridnir raḥmānu biḍurrin lā tughni `annī shafā`atuhum shay-an walā yunqidhūn

rows.arabic: إِنِّىٓ إِذًا لَّفِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: In that case I shall most surely be in clear error:
rows.transliteration: innī idhal lafī ḍalālin mubīn

rows.arabic: إِنِّىٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَٱسْمَعُونِ
rows.translation: Surely I believe in your Lord, therefore hear me.
rows.transliteration: innī āmantu birabbikum fasma`ūn

rows.arabic: قِيلَ ٱدْخُلِ ٱلْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ قَوْمِى يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: It was said: Enter the garden. He said: O would that my people had known
rows.transliteration: qīlad-khulil jannah ۖ qāla yālayta qawmī ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
rows.translation: Of that on account of which my Lord has forgiven me and made me of the honored ones!
rows.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī waja`alanī minal mukramīn

rows.arabic: وَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
rows.translation: And We did not send down upon his people after him any hosts from heaven, nor do We ever send down.
rows.transliteration: wa mā anzalnā `alā qawmihi min ba`dihi min jundin minas samā-i wa mā kunnā munzilīn

rows.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَـٰمِدُونَ
rows.translation: It was naught but a single cry, and lo! they were still.
rows.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūn

rows.arabic: يَـٰحَسْرَةً عَلَى ٱلْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
rows.translation: Alas for the servants! there comes not to them an apostle but they mock at him.
rows.transliteration: yāḥasratan `alal-`ibād ۚ mā ya-tīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahzi-ūn

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
rows.translation: Do they not consider how many of the generations have We destroyed before them, because they do not turn to them?
rows.transliteration: alam yaraw kam ahlaknā qablahum minal qurūni annahum ilayhim lā yarji`ūn

rows.arabic: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
rows.translation: And all of them shall surely be brought before Us.
rows.transliteration: wa in kullul lammā jamī`ul ladaynā muḥḍarūn

rows.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَرْضُ ٱلْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَـٰهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
rows.translation: And a sign to them is the dead earth: We give life to it and bring forth from it grain SQ they eat of it.
rows.transliteration: wa-āyatun lahumul-arḍul maytatu aḥyaynāhā wa-akhrajnā minhā ḥabban faminhu ya-kulūn

rows.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ
rows.translation: And We make therein gardens of palms and grapevines and We make springs to flow forth in it,
rows.transliteration: waja`alnā fīhā jannātin min nakhīlin wa-a`nābin wafajjarnā fīhā minal `uyūn

rows.arabic: لِيَأْكُلُوا۟ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
rows.translation: That they may eat of the fruit thereof, and their hands did not make it; will they not then be grateful?
rows.transliteration: liya-kulū min thamarihi wa mā `amilat-hu aydīhim ۖ afalā yashkurūn

rows.arabic: سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: Glory be to Him Who created pairs of all things, of what the earth grows, and of their kind and of what they do not know.
rows.transliteration: subḥānal ladhī khalaqal-azwāja kullahā mimmā tunbitul-arḍu wa min anfusihim wa mimmā lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
rows.translation: And a sign to them is the night: We draw forth from it the day, then lo! they are in the dark;
rows.transliteration: wa-āyatun lahumul laylu naslakhu minhun nahāra fa-idhā hum muẓlimūn

rows.arabic: وَٱلشَّمْسُ تَجْرِى لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْعَلِيمِ
rows.translation: And the sun runs on to a term appointed for it; that is the ordinance of the Mighty, the Knowing.
rows.transliteration: wash shamsu tajrī limustaqarrin lahā ۚ dhālika taqdīrul `azīzil `alīm

rows.arabic: وَٱلْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَـٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلْعُرْجُونِ ٱلْقَدِيمِ
rows.translation: And (as for) the moon, We have ordained for it stages till it becomes again as an old dry palm branch.
rows.transliteration: wal qamara qaddarnāhu manāzila ḥattā `āda kal `urjūnil qadīm

rows.arabic: لَا ٱلشَّمْسُ يَنۢبَغِى لَهَآ أَن تُدْرِكَ ٱلْقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيْلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
rows.translation: Neither is it allowable to the sun that it should overtake the moon, nor can the night outstrip the day; and all float on in a sphere.
rows.transliteration: lash shamsu yanbaghī lahā an tudrikal qamara walal laylu sābiqun nahār ۚ wakullun fī falakiy yasbaḥūn

rows.arabic: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ
rows.translation: And a sign to them is that We bear their offspring in the laden ship.
rows.transliteration: wa-āyatun lahum annā ḥamalnā dhurriyyatahum fil fulkil mashḥūn

rows.arabic: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِۦ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
rows.translation: And We have created for them the like of it, what they will ride on.
rows.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mithlihi mā yarkabūn

rows.arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
rows.translation: And if We please, We can drown them, then there shall be no succorer for them, nor shall they be rescued
rows.transliteration: wa in nasha-nughriqhum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūn

rows.arabic: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَـٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
rows.translation: But (by) mercy from Us and for enjoyment till a time.
rows.transliteration: illā raḥmatan minnā wa matā`an ilā ḥīn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
rows.translation: And when it is said to them: Guard against what is before you and what is behind you, that mercy may be had on you.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā qīla lahumut-taqū mā bayna aydīkum wa mā khalfakum la`allakum turḥamūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ مِّنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
rows.translation: And there comes not to them a communication of the communications of their Lord but they turn aside from it.
rows.transliteration: wa mā ta-tīhim min āyatim min āyāti rabbihim illā kānū `anhā mu`riḍīn

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُۥٓ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: And when it is said to them: Spend out of what Allah has given you, those who disbelieve say to those who believe: Shall we feed him whom, if Allah please, He could feed? You are in naught but clear error.
rows.transliteration: wa idhā qīla lahum anfiqū mimmā razaqakumullāhu qālal ladhīna kafarū lilladhīna āmanū anuṭ`imu man law yashā-ullāhu aṭ`amahu in antum illā fī ḍalālin mubīn

rows.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
rows.translation: And they say: When will this threat come to pass, if you are truthful?
rows.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhal wa`du in kuntum ṣādiqīn

rows.arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
rows.translation: They wait not for aught but a single cry which will overtake them while they yet contend with one another.
rows.transliteration: mā yanẓurūna illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan ta-khudhuhum wahum yakhiṣṣimūn

rows.arabic: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
rows.translation: So they shall not be able to make a bequest, nor shall they return to their families.
rows.transliteration: falā yastaṭī`ūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarji`ūn

rows.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
rows.translation: And the trumpet shall be blown, when lo! from their graves they shall hasten on to their Lord.
rows.transliteration: wanufikha fiṣ ṣūri fa-idhā hum minal-ajdāthi ilā rabbihim yansilūn

rows.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
rows.translation: They shall say: O woe to us! who has raised us up from our sleeping-place? This is what the Beneficent Allah promised and the apostles told the truth.
rows.transliteration: qālū yāwaylanā man ba`athanā min marqadinā ۜ ۗ hādhā mā wa`adar raḥmānu waṣadaqal mursalūn

rows.arabic: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
rows.translation: There would be naught but a single cry, when lo! they shall all be brought before Us;
rows.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum jamī`ul ladaynā muḥḍarūn

rows.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: So this day no soul shall be dealt with unjustly in the least; and you shall not be rewarded aught but that which you did.
rows.transliteration: fal yawma lā tuẓlamu nafsun shay-an walā tujzawna illā mā kuntum ta`malūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى شُغُلٍ فَـٰكِهُونَ
rows.translation: Surely the dwellers of the garden shall on that day be in an occupation quite happy.
rows.transliteration: inna aṣ-ḥābal jannatil yawma fī shughulin fākihūn

rows.arabic: هُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُهُمْ فِى ظِلَـٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
rows.translation: They and their wives shall be in shades, reclining on raised couches.
rows.transliteration: hum wa-azwājuhum fī ẓilālin `alal-arā-iki muttaki-ūn

rows.arabic: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
rows.translation: They shall have fruits therein, and they shall have whatever they desire.
rows.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yadda`ūn

rows.arabic: سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
rows.translation: Peace: a word from a Merciful Lord.
rows.transliteration: salāmun qawlan min rabbin raḥīm

rows.arabic: وَٱمْتَـٰزُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ
rows.translation: And get aside today, O guilty ones!
rows.transliteration: wamtāzul yawma ayyuhal mujrimūn

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَـٰبَنِىٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: Did I not charge you, O children of Adam! that you should not serve the Shaitan? Surely he is your open enemy,
rows.transliteration: alam a`had ilaykum yābanī ādama an lā ta`budush shayṭān ۖ innahu lakum `aduwwun mubīn

rows.arabic: وَأَنِ ٱعْبُدُونِى ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
rows.translation: And that you should serve Me; this is the right way.
rows.transliteration: wa-ani'-budūnī ۚ hādhā ṣirāṭun mustaqīm

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ
rows.translation: And certainly he led astray numerous people from among you. What! could you not then understand?
rows.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīrā ۖ afalam takūnū ta`qilūn

rows.arabic: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
rows.translation: This is the hell with which you were threatened.
rows.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamul latī kuntum tū`adūn

rows.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
rows.translation: Enter into it this day because you disbelieved.
rows.transliteration: iṣ-lawhal yawma bimā kuntum takfurūn

rows.arabic: ٱلْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفْوَٰهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
rows.translation: On that day We will set a seal upon their mouths, and their hands shall speak to Us, and their feet shall bear witness of what they earned.
rows.transliteration: al yawma nakhtimu `alā afwāhihim watukallimunā aydīhim watash-hadu arjuluhum bimā kānū yaksibūn

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
rows.translation: And if We please We would certainly put out their eyes, then they would run about groping for the way, but how should they see?
rows.transliteration: walaw nashā-u laṭamasnā `alā a`yunihim fastabaquṣ ṣirāṭa fa-annā yubṣirūn

rows.arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
rows.translation: And if We please We would surely transform them in their place, then they would not be able to go on, nor will they return.
rows.transliteration: walaw nashā-u lamasakhnāhum `alā makānatihim famas-taṭā`ū muḍiyyan walā yarji`ūn

rows.arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
rows.translation: And whomsoever We cause to live long, We reduce (him) to an abject state in constitution; do they not then understand?
rows.transliteration: wa man nu`ammirhu nunakkis-hu fil khalq ۖ afalā ya`qilūn

rows.arabic: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَـٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: And We have not taught him poetry, nor is it meet for him; it is nothing but a reminder and a plain Quran,
rows.transliteration: wa mā `allamnāhush shi`ra wa mā yanbaghī lah ۚ in huwa illā dhikrun waqur-ānun mubīn

rows.arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
rows.translation: That it may warn him who would have life, and (that) the word may prove true against the unbelievers.
rows.transliteration: liyundhira man kāna ḥayyan wayaḥiqqal qawlu `alal-kāfirīn

rows.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَـٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَـٰلِكُونَ
rows.translation: Do they not see that We have created cattle for them, out of what Our hands have wrought, so they are their masters?
rows.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā khalaqnā lahum mimmā `amilat aydīnā an`āman fahum lahā mālikūn

rows.arabic: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
rows.translation: And We have subjected them to them, so some of them they have to ride upon, and some of them they eat.
rows.transliteration: wadhallalnāhā lahum faminhā rakūbuhum wa minhā ya-kulūn

rows.arabic: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
rows.translation: And therein they have advantages and drinks; will they not then be grateful?
rows.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfi`u wa mashārib ۖ afalā yashkurūn

rows.arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
rows.translation: And they have taken gods besides Allah that they may be helped.
rows.transliteration: wattakhadhū min dūnillāhi ālihatan la`allahum yunṣarūn

rows.arabic: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
rows.translation: (But) they shall not be able to assist them, and they shall be a host brought up before them.
rows.transliteration: lā yastaṭī`ūna naṣrahum wahum lahum jundun muḥḍarūn

rows.arabic: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
rows.translation: Therefore let not their speech grieve you; surely We know what they do in secret and what they do openly.
rows.transliteration: falā yaḥzunka qawluhum ۘ innā na`lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu`linūn

rows.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: Does not man see that We have created him from the small seed? Then lo! he is an open disputant.
rows.transliteration: awalam yaral-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min nuṭfatin fa-idhā huwa khaṣīmun mubīn

rows.arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِىَ خَلْقَهُۥ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْىِ ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ وَهِىَ رَمِيمٌ
rows.translation: And he strikes out a likeness for Us and forgets his own creation. Says he: Who will give life to the bones when they are rotten?
rows.transliteration: waḍaraba lanā mathalan wanasiya khalqah ۖ qāla man yuḥyil `iẓāma wahiya ramīm

rows.arabic: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: Say: He will give life to them Who brought them into existence at first, and He is cognizant of all creation
rows.transliteration: qul yuḥyīhal ladhī ansha-ahā awwala marrah ۖ wahuwa bikulli khalqin `alīm

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
rows.translation: He Who has made for you the fire (to burn) from the green tree, so that with it you kindle (fire).
rows.transliteration: alladhī ja`ala lakum minash shajaril-akhḍari nāran fa-idhā antum minhu tūqidūn

rows.arabic: أَوَلَيْسَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
rows.translation: Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like of them? Yea! and He is the Creator (of all), the Knower.
rows.transliteration: awalaysal ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa biqādirin `alā an yakhluqa mithlahum ۚ balā wahuwal khallāqul `alīm

rows.arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيْـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
rows.translation: His command, when He intends anything, is only to say to it: Be, so it is.
rows.transliteration: innamā amruhu idhā arāda shay-an an yaqūla lahu kun fayakūn

rows.arabic: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
rows.translation: Therefore glory be to Him in Whose hand is the kingdom of all things, and to Him you shall be brought back.
rows.transliteration: fasubḥānal ladhī biyadihi malakūtu kulli shay-in wa ilayhi turja`ūn
